By way of its official Amazon storefront, Navee is offering its latest XT5 Pro Long-Range Off-Road Electric Scooter at $1,299.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page $300 off coupon, beating out its direct website pricing by $200. This is the newest ride from Navee that has been going for $1,500 since its release in early November, though it starts off higher from $1,600 at Amazon. Despite this higher starting rate, we’ve only seen one previous discount coming from its Amazon storefront, which dropped costs to $1,400 mid-December. Now, you can score an even larger $200 markdown off the going rate that lands it at a new all-time low price.

items.summary: Dec 29 (Reuters) - ‌Winter Storm Ezra disrupted holiday travel across the U.S. Northeast, Midwest and Great Lakes for a third straight day ‌on Monday, causing thousands of flight delays and hundreds of cancellations as airlines scrambled to recover and ‌meteorologists warned of a brewing "bomb cyclone" that could further snarl trips ahead of the New Year's holiday. items.title: BiH sees sharp rise in wind, solar power generation in 2025
items.summary: SARAJEVO, Dec. 29 (Xinhua) -- Electricity generation from wind and solar power plants connected to the transmission grid in Bosnia and Herzegovina (BiH) reached 1.2 terawatt-hours (TWh) in 2025, doubling year on year, according to data released by the Agency for Statistics of BiH. items.title: Researchers harness cancer resistance mutations to fight tumors
